question:
Which of the following is the correct chronological order of
i) Capturing of Cuttack by British
ii) Capturing of Puri
iii) Capturing of Baleswar
iv) Capturing of Sambalpur
explanation: Capturing of Puri(18<sup>th</sup> September 1803), Baleswar (22<sup>nd</sup> September 1803), Cuttack (14<sup>th</sup> October 1803), Sambalpur (January 1804)
